department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: purchase of an indoor distributed antennae system
duration_in_months: It is expected that the contract will last approximately from 02/09/2022 to 11/10/2023
full_summary:
### 5P203-220073: Indoor Distributed Antenna System

**Reference:** WS3514087885 - Doc3514185910

**Amendment:** 3

**Public Notice:** To|

**Publication Date:** September 13, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** October 12, 2022 at 14:00 HAE

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3514087885
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (except NCR), Gaspé

**Contracting Entity:**

*   **Department:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Location:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**End-User Entity:**

*   **Agency:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)
*   **Location:** 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3

**Contact Information:**

*   **Contact:** Francois S. Martineau, SPAC/PSPC
*   **Email:** [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14088535?extsite=MTQwODg1MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14088535?extsite=MTQwODg1MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Parks Canada, invites offers for the acquisition of an indoor distributed antennae system, including delivery, installation, and training in Gaspé, Quebec, Canada. The bid submission must be clearly marked with the solicitation number and company name. The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must
